title: Kum sul vei khua a lo thalin
lyrics:
Kum sul vei khua a lo thalin,
Van Lal nau ang a pian ni,
A her chhuak thin leng zawngte lawman,
Hlimin i lawm theuh ang u;
Zai tin rema tlang tin chuanin,
Kan lawm hla thang ri van hnuai khat rawh se.

Tlawm mah se, a pianna run chu,
Van Lal ropui ber a ni;
A faktu angel leng rualte chuan,
"Chungnung berah ropui rawh se,
Lei chungah remna leng se,"
Tia fakin an zai thangvan sangah.

Keini pawhin lenrual kim te'n,
Zaiin i fak ve ang u;
'Haleluia! Chungnung ber,' tiin,
Amah chu sual bawih ata
Min tlantu Lal lian a ni a,
A fak hla thang ri van hnuai khat rawh se.
